title: Utility of Consumer-Grade Wearable Devices for Inferring Physical and Mental Health Outcomes in Severe Mental Illness: Systematic Review
details: L Hassan, A Milton, C Sawyer, AJ Casson, J Torous… - JMIR Mental Health, 2025
abstract: Background Digital wearable devices, worn on or close to the body, have potential for passively detecting mental and physical health symptoms among people with severe mental illness (SMI); however, the roles of consumer-grade devices are not …
